programme.desc: Bloomberg TV's flagship markets programme, providing key insights, analysis and context at the market close. It's a highly intelligent look at the markets that misses nothing.

programme.desc: Live from New York and Sydney. The latest news impacting markets, business and finance around the world.

programme.title: Bloomberg Daybreak: Asia
programme.desc: Bloomberg Daybreak: Asia. Live from New York and Hong Kong, Bloomberg Daybreak: Asia brings you the essential stories from the close of the US markets to the open of trading across Asia.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets: China Open
programme.desc: The definitive guide to the markets in Hong Kong and on the mainland. Rishaad Salamat, David Ingles, Tom Mackenzie and Yvonne Man bring you the latest analysis to get you ready for the trading day.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets: Asia
programme.desc: Live from Hong Kong, Bloomberg Markets: Asia brings you the most important global business and breaking markets news information as it happens.

programme.title: Bloomberg Daybreak: Middle East
programme.desc: Live from Dubai, connecting Asian markets to the European opens. The show focuses on global macro issues with a Middle Eastern context.

programme.desc: Live market reports from London and overnight news from Wall Street. Markets never sleep and neither does Bloomberg News. Track investments 24 hours a day, around the world.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets: European Open
programme.desc: Live from London, Bloomberg Markets: European Open is focused on bringing you the most important global business and breaking markets news and information as it happens.

programme.desc: Live from New York, Bloomberg Markets: Americas is focused on bringing you the most important global business and breaking markets news and information as it happens.

programme.desc: The movie follows five film students who are planning to shoot a movie at a haunted house. However, strange and creepy things begin happening to them there.

programme.title: The Wretched
programme.desc: A defiant teenage boy, struggling with his parents' imminent divorce, faces off with a thousand year-old witch, who is living beneath the skin of and posing as the woman next door.

programme.title: The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: A bounty hunter learns that his next target is his ex-wife, a reporter working on a murder cover-up. Soon after their reunion, the always-at-odds duo find themselves on a run-for-their-lives adventure.

programme.title: Transformers
programme.desc: An ancient struggle between two Cybertronian races, the heroic Autobots and the evil Decepticons, comes to Earth, with a clue to the ultimate power held by a teenager.

programme.desc: Fakhri Shafiq berkongsi cara menyembuhkan penyakit kuda, cirit-birit and penanaman pokok Hangdoman, cara tradisi merawat luka, perkongsian resipi rahsia Gulai Daging Salai dan rahsia amalan Encik Zakaria.

programme.title: Panorama
programme.desc: Wan Aliazar Wan Halim mengupas bagaimana COVID19 yang mengubah norma kehidupan manusia hari ini. Malah ia turut menyebabkan umat Islam seluruh dunia dihadkan untuk melaksanakan ibadah haji.

programme.title: Impian Tanpa Sempadan

programme.title: Rumpuan Melayu Global
programme.desc: Saksikan perkongsian kejayaan anak-anak Melayu yang berjaya.

programme.title: Waris Jelajah
programme.desc: Bersama pengcara Zee Zainal menelusuri sejarah dan lokasi-lokasi menarik di Indo-China, dan untuk episod kali ini lokasinya adalah Hue, Vietnam.

programme.title: Eksplorasi Seni Kraf

programme.title: Bacaan Yassin

programme.title: Nasyid Minggu Ini

programme.title: Berita Pagi Nasional

programme.title: Selamat Pagi Malaysia
